title: The end is the beginning
description: An innocent child the product of two completely self destructive people born into a life of abuse and total dysfunction. Meet the 13 year old survivor of excruciating pain and total victimization. This book is a symbolic release of accumulated weight carried from a painful past. In coming forward,the hope is to derive something positive from something so painful for me. Reaching out- beyond oneself as nothing more than a survivor to help raise awareness for all abused and neglected children.
author: Armond DeGasperis
